solution_line_template: Jessie won {jessie_multiplier} times the amount of the {scott_awards} awards that Scott won so he won {jessie_multiplier}*{scott_awards} = <<{jessie_multiplier}*{scott_awards}={jessie_awards}>>{jessie_awards} awards
The rival athlete won twice the awards as Jessie, who won {jessie_awards} so he won {rival_multiplier}*{jessie_awards} = <<{rival_multiplier}*{jessie_awards}={rival_awards}>>{rival_awards} awards
